attributes.action: More protection for tradesmen with domestic customers with payments and slander.
attributes.additional_details: It’s very close to home, affects our family, non payment still means we have bills, slander out of spite also affects earnings & reputation. Not enough protection at all
attributes.background:
Put in legislations and protections for tradesmen who have difficult customers who pay invoices late affecting cash flows or complete non payment.
Also, to protect these tradesmen from defamation without any hard evidence. Online/offline

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about non-payment for services, and slander against tradespeople, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Tradespeople can already take legal action if a customer does not pay for their services, or slanders them.
